prompts.prompt: Find a user by username {userName} and show their display name, department, and job title.

template.name: find-user-by-username
template.description: Finds a user using their username (email address/UPN) and shows key details.

arguments.name: userName
arguments.description: The user's username (user principal name or email address).

prompts.prompt: Show all users in the department {departmentName}, including their display name and email address.

template.name: list-users-by-department
template.description: Lists all users in the specified department, showing display name and email address.

arguments.name: departmentName
arguments.description: The department name to filter users by.

prompts.prompt: Find a user by their display name: {userDisplayName}, and show their full profile.

template.name: find-user-by-displayname
template.description: Finds a user by their full display name, returning full profile.
